title: S7E06 – "Prices to Pay" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Nick Botic, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about eerie H20, devilish debts, villainous views, and ghoulish graveyards.

             
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
